message.content: {"id": "5473", "title": "Bug 5473: ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces", "description": "Bug 5473ShiftLeft behavior with intermixed tabs and spaces Build 200110251.", "OB": "The ShiftLeft operation does not behave as expected when there are intermixed tabs and spaces in the lines. To reproduce the issue, replace the tab character in the first line with spaces so that both lines are indented the same visually. Then, execute the ShiftLeft operation. The text does not move as expected. In the first scenario, it seems like the second line should be shifted left and the first line should be shifted left at least to the position of the space character (i.e., get rid of the tab). At any rate, it is confusing if there is a stray space, as it is unclear why the text won't shift.", "EB": "After replacing the tab character in the first line with spaces to ensure consistent indentation, executing the ShiftLeft operation should properly shift the lines. Currently, the ShiftLeft operation does not handle intermixed tabs and spaces correctly, resulting in incorrect behavior. It is expected that the second line should be shifted left and the first line should be shifted left at least up to the position of the space character (i.e., remove the tab). This improvement would make the behavior more consistent and prevent confusion when encountering stray spaces.", "SR": ""}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}

<BUG REPORT>

', 'OB': "Replace the tab character in the first line with spaces so that the twolines are indented the same visually.Execute ShiftLeft.The text now moves.I'm not sure how this is spec'd, but in the first scenario it seems like thesecond line should be shifted left and the first line should be shifted left atleast to the space character (i.e., get rid of the tab).At any rate, it'sdefinitely confusing if there is a stray space.You don't know why the textwon't shift. ", 'EB': "Replace the tab character in the first line with spaces so that the twolines are indented the same visually.Execute ShiftLeft.The text now moves.I'm not sure how this is spec'd, but in the first scenario it seems like thesecond line should be shifted left and the first line should be shifted left atleast to the space character (i.e., get rid of the tab).At any rate, it'sdefinitely confusing if there is a stray space.You don't know why the textwon't shift. ", 'SR': ''}
